attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: this app killed my grandma and doxxed my own father. idk how this thing is still on the app store. all i wanted was to get news on my dear lovely savior donald john trump 😔❤️. dissapointed donald, really dissapointed.

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: This app is not good and cause stress and depression. It also is very glitchy and show I orange all the time instead of out pedo president🥰🥰🥰much no love.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app CRASHED MY PHONE! Yes you heard me right CRASHED MY PHONE! I will NOT stand for it! I have important things! What if they were deleted! I expected more from our “2020 president”

attributes.title: Very very disappointing
attributes.review: Very slow and laggy. Took forever to download. Very very sad I am crying so much ;(😖😫😫😣😣😿😿😿anyways black lives matter 🥰

attributes.title: scarred for LIFE!!!!
attributes.review: this app is DISGUSTING and when i first opened it i almost had a HEART ATTACK!! THIS APP ALMOST CAUSED MY DEATHHH! i would not recommend this app to anyone. This app gave me anxiety and i’ve been to THERAPY because of this app! TRULY HORRIFYING CONTENT AND THE REASON OF MY TRAUMA.

attributes.title: Government spying app?
attributes.review: I downloaded this because I’m a YUGE trumpster but then i noticed that it was recording everything i was saying? Beware I think this is a government spying trap. Dont trust it!

attributes.title: -1 out of 10
attributes.review:
ABSOLUTE TOTAL GARBAGE, waste of iPhone space and time. It should not exist, please remove this app NOW. 

-TikTok Teen from last time
P.S We won’t go down without a fight

attributes.title: gave my phone a virus
attributes.review: i advise you to not download this app!! this application added a virus to my new iphone11. i am furious, and apple i please beg you to get it removed off the appstore as soon as possible. also, when i opened the app i saw an ugly orange that ended up cracking my screen.. smh apple do better.

attributes.title: One star!
attributes.review: This app is just horrible. When I first opened the app I saw a horrible president! I hope this app gets off the app store!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE IS AN UNDERSTATEMENT
attributes.review: This app must be taken down.  Worst app I have ever downloaded. Represents nearly all the horrible things in the country.  No need to further explain.
